title: 114_hr6303
content: SECTION 1. POST OFFICE DESIGNATIONS. The United States Postal Service facility in Santa Barbara, California, will be named the "Special Warfare Operator Master Chief Petty Officer (SEAL) Louis 'Lou' J. Langlais Post Office Building." The facility in Shelby, Indiana, will be named the "Richard Allen Cable Post Office." Any references to these facilities in official documents will reflect their new names. The United States Postal Service facility in Staten Island, New York, will be named the "Leonard Montalto Post Office Building." The facility in Oxford, Mississippi, will be named the "Army First Lieutenant Donald C. Carwile Post Office Building." Any references to these facilities in official documents will reflect their new names. The United States Postal Service facility in Coldspring, Texas, will be named the "E. Marie Youngblood Post Office." The facility in Zapata, Texas, will be named the "Zapata Veterans Post Office." Any references to these facilities in official documents will reflect their new names. The United States Postal Service facility in Marietta, Georgia, will be named the "Marine Lance Corporal Squire 'Skip' Wells Post Office Building." The facility in Chicago, Illinois, will be named the "Officer Joseph P. Cali Post Office Building." References to these facilities in official documents will reflect their new names. The United States Postal Service facility in Saipan, Northern Mariana Islands, will be named the "Segundo T. Sablan and CNMI Fallen Military Heroes Post Office Building." Any references to this facility in official documents will now reflect its new name. The United States Postal Service facility at 1101 Davis Street in Evanston, Illinois, will be named the "Abner J. Mikva Post Office Building." Any mention of this facility in official records will now refer to it by this new name. The United States Postal Service will establish new ZIP codes for specific communities by September 30, 2017, including Miami Lakes, Florida, Storey County, Nevada, Flanders, Northampton, and Riverside in the Town of Southampton, New York, Ocoee, Florida, and Glendale, New York.
